item.description:
I will be speaking about the 7 main chakras and why it is important to have them balanced on a regular basis. I am a certified Reiki Master and a certified Chakra Instructor and Healer. I will also be speaking about how the chakras are connected to certain parts of our being and how past or present trauma in our lives changes these chakras and the way they perform. There will be plenty of hand outs to refer to during and after the class. Then I will perform a chakra healing demonstration using crystals and a singing bowl. Questions will be welcomed. To find out more information about me you can go to my website at www.intothelight.vpweb.com. The address must be searched for in the address box since it is not a website that can be googled.

There will be a $5.00 charge at the door.
Thank you.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the one with all of the hand outs!
item.name: What are the Chakras and why should they be balanced?
